item.description: Alpine Linux # Improvement of date command # Before # $ LAST_MONTH=`date -d "1970.01.01-00:00:$(( $( date +\%s ) - $(( 24 * 60 * 60 * 30 )) ))" +%Y%m` $ echo $LAST_MONTH Add coreutils package # apk add --update coreutils && rm -rf /var/cache/apk/* After # $ LAST_MONTH=`date +\%Y\%m -d 'last month'` $ echo $LAST_MONTH
